member.name: M:Dot.Net.Enumerable.Extensions.Arrays.LiftNCopySafe(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Copies bytes starting from (included) to (Included) and onwards.
NOTE: This method is SAFE version of as constraint are checked.
member.param: Position from which to start copying bytes.
Total number of bytes to copy.
Position at which starting writing the bytes.

member.name: M:Dot.Net.Enumerable.Extensions.Arrays.EnsureCapacity(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if array needs to be resized. When resize takes place, the content of are copied to the newly created array.
